rule: Descriptions can be written in any language and may contain grammatical errors or inappropriate vocabulary.
input: Un hombre corriendo en el parque con zapatos nuevos.
coverage: A fit man with short dark hair, dressed in a vibrant red athletic shirt and brand new white running shoes, is captured mid-stride as he sprints along a sunlit park path. It's early morning, and the golden sunlight streams through the tall trees, creating dappled shadows on the green grass. The background features blooming flowers and a serene lake, enhancing the natural beauty of the setting. The image evokes a sense of vitality and peaceful determination, inspiring viewers with its dynamic and uplifting atmosphere.
validityText:
The input is written in Spanish ("Un hombre corriendo en el parque con zapatos nuevos."), whereas the input specification requires that it be written in English. This violates the rule that "The input must be written in English."

ERR
